instructions:
Welcome to University of Illinois Adventure!
----------------------------------------------------------

Your goal is to get to Kams tonight to relax with your friends after a long week.
However you need to do somethings before you can go:
1.  Get a negative Covid Test Result
2.  Get something to eat before you go out
3.  Get Swole!
4.  Finish studying at the library.

rooms.name: Home
rooms.description: You are at home, it's quiet and smells like pizza rolls

rooms.name: BlockOne
rooms.description: You're outside of your dorm, you look over and see some a group feeding the squirrels

rooms.name: BlockTwo
rooms.description: You walk to the next block. Maybe you should have rode a bike.

rooms.name: BlockThree
rooms.description: Hey your favorite block! You see The Quad, Kam's, and Professor Woodley's house.

rooms.name: FatSandwich
rooms.description: You are at Fat Sandwich. Usually you eat here at 1 A.M.

rooms.name: CovidTestCenter
rooms.description:
You enter the test center.
"Funnel or Straw?" they ask.
"Who get's a straw?" you think to yourself.

rooms.name: TheQuad
rooms.description: You walk one to The Quad and you feel happy. There's people hammocking, playing frisbee, and picnicking.

rooms.name: ProfessorsHouse
rooms.description: Why did you think that was a good idea? The cops arrested you for breaking and entering.

rooms.name: TheARC
rooms.description: It's grind time. Let's hit those weights.

rooms.name: EngineeringLibrary
rooms.description: Exams are next week and you hear people crying. Oh well you still have to study.

rooms.name: Kams
rooms.description: You made it to Kam's! Go have a good night with your friends!
